reasons.title: We Pay The Highest Commissions
reasons.reason: Our commission structure is straightforward, offering 30%-40% commissions on all courses. You earn on every sale made through your referral link without worrying about creating products or handling customer service.

reasons.title: We Offer a Wide Range of Products
reasons.reason: Our affiliate program includes a variety of embedded systems courses, enabling affiliates to target diverse audiences effectively.

reasons.title: Dedicated Support Team
reasons.reason: Our affiliate team provides marketing materials, training, and support to ensure your success as an affiliate.

data.name: EmbeddedExpert.io
data.about: EmbeddedExpertIO represents a vibrant collective dedicated to the mastery of sophisticated embedded systems software development for professionals. EmbeddedExpertIO stands as a premier source of tailored embedded systems development courses, catering to individuals and enterprises seeking to hone or acquire embedded firmware programming expertise. Our extensive course selections encompass beginner to advanced levels, addressing diverse facets of embedded systems development, such as WiFi, STM32, IoT systems design, memory safeguarding, and beyond. Our core objective is to equip individuals and organizations with the indispensable skills to thrive in the swiftly evolving embedded systems sector. We achieve this by providing immersive, hands-on education under the guidance of seasoned industry specialists. Our ambition is to emerge as the favored learning platform for embedded systems development professionals across the globe.

questions.question: What is EmbeddedExpert.io?
questions.answer: EmbeddedExpertIO represents a vibrant collective dedicated to the mastery of sophisticated embedded systems software development for professionals. EmbeddedExpertIO stands as a premier source of tailored embedded systems development courses, catering to individuals and enterprises seeking to hone or acquire embedded firmware programming expertise. Our extensive course selections encompass beginner to advanced levels, addressing diverse facets of embedded systems development, such as WiFi, STM32, IoT systems design, memory safeguarding, and beyond. Our core objective is to equip individuals and organizations with the indispensable skills to thrive in the swiftly evolving embedded systems sector. We achieve this by providing immersive, hands-on education under the guidance of seasoned industry specialists. Our ambition is to emerge as the favored learning platform for embedded systems development professionals across the globe

questions.question: How can I enroll in a course?
questions.answer: You can enroll in a course by visiting our website, selecting the course you are interested in, and following the enrollment instructions provided.

questions.question: Do you offer certificates for course completion?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer certificates upon successful completion of our courses.

questions.question: What payment methods are accepted?
questions.answer: We accept various payment methods including credit/debit cards, PayPal, and other online payment options.

questions.question: Is there a refund policy?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer a 30-day refund policy if you are not satisfied with the course.

data.title: Realtime Operating Systems Proficiency Test
data.description: Prepare comprehensively for Embedded Software Engineer roles with our RTOS proficiency test.

reviews.review: Israel is a great instructor. Every step is explained not only what to do but why. I would recommend this course over any other.
reviews.course: Embedded Systems Bare-Metal Programming Ground Up™ (STM32)

reviews.review: I thought this was going to be a course that followed another book, but when he directed us to the user/dev documentation to find answers, I saw this was something special. Problem-solving should always be at the focus of any programming course, even above syntaxt and technology. Very good start to this course.
reviews.course_name: Embedded Systems Bare-Metal Programming Ground Up™ (STM32)
reviews.name: Abigail J.

reviews.review: Explanation is really good but could go deeper into some stuff. Especially for beginners like me it is hard to understand some topics which I never heard before. But like many courses they don´t share their slides which is really a shame since udemy also blocked the screenshot function it is really hard and unnecessary complex to take notes.
reviews.course_name: ARM Assembly Language From Ground Up™ 1
reviews.name: Pascal W.

reviews.review: This course is amazing. It takes you from absolute beginner to expert in programming STM32 MCU. It taught you all the basic especially reading the reference manual. I highly recommend the instructor if you would like to learn about embedded systems.
reviews.course_name: Embedded Systems Bare-Metal Programming Ground Up™ (STM32)
reviews.name: Aisha A.

reviews.review: Very enlightening and eye opening .I always wondered about how different logic gates come together to create a microarchitecture and then and instruction set and then and then a full fledged architecture like ARM . This course has been able to explain all of that. Looking forward to the rest of the course.
reviews.course_name: ARM Assembly Language From Ground Up™ 1
reviews.name: Marvin

reviews.review: The course is well structured and detailed. It's good for beginners and advanced students as the examples are all in assembly language which is not offered by other instructors. I am waiting for more examples to be added and i really enjoyed this course.
reviews.course_name: ARM Assembly Language From Ground Up™ 1
reviews.name: Nishad P.

reviews.review: The course is explained in a friendly manner, the instructor tells what each line of code does and demonstrates the result code which is really satisfying, it would be also great if he could had shown the use of usefull API's like CMSIS-RTOS.
reviews.course_name: Build Your Own RealTime OS (RTOS) From Ground Up™ on ARM 1
reviews.name: Abraham R.

reviews.review: Excellent course. I am an embedded systems lecturer at local college and I must say, I found the content very useful and well presented. I recommend this to any embedded systems student.
reviews.course_name: Build Your Own RealTime OS (RTOS) From Ground Up™ on ARM 1
reviews.name: James K.

reviews.review: Well taught. The course goes deep into key areas like the design of scheduling algorithms and even explaining the algorithms using animations, this makes the learning process very easy.
reviews.course_name: Build Your Own RealTime OS (RTOS) From Ground Up™ on ARM 1
reviews.name: Limd

testimonials.testimonial: The courses are excellent and have helped me gain valuable skills and secure a freelancing business.
testimonials.name: Simon Morrison

testimonials.testimonial: All the course I took are great! In all of them I learned new and useful things that I use in my personal projects, and also they helped me to achieve a job as a software embedded engineer. Also, I'm still taking them to learn new things and improve my skills in embedded systems. I totally recommend these courses! And thank you to the Israel to share his knowledge to everyone!
testimonials.name: Ricardo Escarcega

testimonials.testimonial: The material offered by your courses is one of the most systematic and easily understandable for beginners.I would also like to note that only your courses cover a large range of topics from Embedded Software Development and Embedded Systems itself. Not so long ago, I switched to using your courses through your platform and I hope it will develop. About me , my name is Ivan and I am a Design and Application Engineer from the Mechanical and Electrical field of Marine HVAC system, I am from Russia, I am 37 years old. I have a higher education in the field of Operation and Maintenance of Motor transport (Automotive). After many years of experience as an engineer in my specialty, I came across the fact that it became necessary to study Embedded systems and their programming, and so I found the content I needed in your courses.I hope you will develop and graduate new courses. Personally, I would really like to see topics dedicated to communication buses - CAN, CAN FD, LIN, RS-485, FlexRay and so on.
testimonials.name: Ivan

testimonials.testimonial: I have done several of the EmbeddedExpertIO courses. I have enjoyed all of them and gained valuable additional knowledge and skills. Has helped me to obtain more work in my freelancing business.
testimonials.name: Simon Morrison

testimonials.testimonial: Thanks to Israel's course, I discovered my passion for STM32 microcontrollers and have found true love in it. I previously only knew how to design boards with less powerful controllers. Now, I can incorporate STM32 controllers into my custom boards and program them. I am now on the path to becoming a complete embedded software and hardware engineer, thanks to the ongoing courses. I am grateful for the opportunity provided by Israel to enhance my skills and become a better version of myself.
testimonials.name: Evans Honu

instructors.name: Israel Gbati and there are other instructors
instructors.bio: Israel Ninsaw Gbati is a distinguished firmware engineer boasting over a decade of hands-on experience in the field. Throughout his career, he has shared his profound knowledge to more than 100,000 professionals, helping to shape the next generation of expets. In addition to his engineering expertise, Israel is an entrepreneur and an award-winning inventor, recognized for his exceptional inventions. He holds a Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering and Automation, complemented by a double Masters degree in Global Innovation Design from Imperial College London and the Royal College of Arts.

courses.name: ARM GNU Assembly Programming From Ground Up™
courses.description: This is the GNU version of the popular ARM Assembly Programming From Ground Up™ 1 & 2 courses. Covering ARM Systems Design, Architecture, and Practical Assembly Programming, this is the most comprehensive ARM assembly course online.

courses.name: STM32 Development Learning Path
courses.description: Master STM32CubeMX 5 and CubeIDE for embedded systems firmware and peripheral driver development, covering USB, PWM, SPI, ADC, UART, DMA, FreeRTOS, and bare-metal programming. Gain proficiency in STM32 HAL APIs, Low-Layer APIs, and ARM Cortex-M development boards.

courses.name: Mastering STM32CubeMX 5 and CubeIDE - Embedded Systems
courses.description: Learn to build embedded systems firmware and peripheral drivers using STM32CubeMX 5 and CubeIDE. Master peripheral configurations, middleware, and bare-metal development.

courses.name: Embedded Systems STM32 Low-Layer APIs(LL) Driver Development
courses.description: Learn to develop drivers for STM32 peripherals using Low-Layer APIs (LL) with a focus on optimization and hardware-level control. Master ADC, UART, PWM, GPIO, TIMER, I2C, SPI, RTC, WWDG, IWDG, RCC, EXTI, and more.
courses.image: https://be.embeddedexpert.io/public/storage/upload/books/230126091904-7643Embedded Systems STM32 Low-Layer APIs(LL) Driver Development.webp

courses.name: Embedded Systems Bare-Metal Programming Ground Up™ (STM32F4)
courses.description: Learn to navigate microcontroller reference manuals and datasheets to build peripheral drivers and firmware using bare-metal embedded C. Master configuring peripherals like ADC, UART, PWM, GPIO, TIMER, I2C, SPI, and more.

courses.name: Embedded Ethernet Essential Training with CubeMX
courses.description: Learn to build embedded Ethernet applications using STM32CubeMX. Master configuring Ethernet modules, hosting web pages, and controlling hardware remotely.

courses.name: Embedded Systems STM32 HAL APIs Driver Development
courses.description: Learn to develop drivers for STM32 peripherals using HAL APIs. Master ADC, UART, PWM, GPIO, TIMER, I2C, SPI, RTC, RCC, EXTI, and more.
courses.image: https://be.embeddedexpert.io/public/storage/upload/books/230126092252-3202Embedded Systems STM32 HAL APIs Driver Development.webp

courses.name: Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) From Ground Up™
courses.description: This course provides in-depth training to build BLE embedded devices and communicate with other smart devices. Learn the BLE protocol, stack, and create your own services and characteristics.

courses.name: Build Your Own RealTime OS (RTOS 2) From Ground Up™ on ARM 2
courses.description: This course teaches you how to build Real-Time Operating Systems through intensive practice and theory. It covers various scheduling algorithms, Inter-Thread communication tools, and OS Kernel development.
courses.image: https://be.embeddedexpert.io/public/storage/upload/books/230131074903-9408Build Your Own RealTime OS (RTOS 2) From Ground Up™ on ARM 200.webp

courses.name: Deep Learning on ARM Processors - From Ground Up™
courses.description: Learn to build deep neural networks from scratch on microcontrollers, covering training, inference, and quantization methods for deployment. Master deep learning firmware for handwriting recognition using Keras, CubeMX.AI, and more.
courses.image: https://be.embeddedexpert.io/public/storage/upload/books/230126092925-3689Deep Learning on ARM Processors - From Ground Up™.webp

courses.name: Embedded Ethernet Programming with HAL
courses.description: Learn to write/configure drivers for the Ethernet peripheral and develop embedded Ethernet firmware for networking protocols using STM32 HAL APIs. This course covers networking fundamentals, driver development, and building Ethernet applications.

courses.name: Build Your Own RealTime OS (RTOS 1) From Ground Up™ on ARM 1
courses.description: Learn to build a Real-Time Operating System from scratch, exploring scheduling algorithms and inter-thread communication tools. Ideal for improving embedded firmware development skills.
courses.image: https://be.embeddedexpert.io/public/storage/upload/books/230131075127-1456Build Your Own RealTime OS (RTOS 1) From Ground Up™ on ARM 100.webp

courses.name: FreeRTOS From Ground Up™ on ARM Processors
courses.description: Learn the foundations of real-time systems and build real-time applications using FreeRTOS. Master multitask FreeRTOS applications, scheduling algorithms, and porting FreeRTOS to ARM processors.
courses.image: https://be.embeddedexpert.io/public/storage/upload/books/230131074211-4870FreeRTOS From Ground Up™ on ARM Processors.webp

courses.name: Practical Low Cost Bare-Metal Bluetooth Development
courses.description: Learn to develop bare-metal drivers and libraries for popular low-cost Bluetooth chips, covering Bluetooth Classic, BLE 4.0, and BLE 5.0. This course includes hands-on projects for interfacing Bluetooth chips with STM32 microcontrollers.
courses.image: https://be.embeddedexpert.io/public/storage/upload/books/230203080304-3498Practical Low Cost Bare Metal Bluetooth Development.jpg

courses.name: Embedded IR Remote Control with NEC Protocol
courses.description: Learn to develop bare-metal drivers and libraries to control your embedded device using IR remote controls. This course covers IR modulation, NEC protocol, and real-world applications.
courses.image: https://be.embeddedexpert.io/public/storage/upload/books/230201034604-1723Embedded IR Remote Control with NEC Protocol.jpg

courses.name: Embedded Systems Cellular Firmware Development(GSM)
courses.description: Learn to develop drivers and libraries for adding cellular functionality to your embedded device using the STM32 microcontroller and the A6 GSM/GPRS chip. Understand cellular communication, including phone calls, SMS, and M2M.

courses.name: Embedded Display Drivers Development: A Bare-Metal Approach
courses.description: Learn essential concepts and techniques for developing display drivers for various applications using STM32 microcontrollers. Gain hands-on experience with real-world examples and exercises.
courses.image: https://be.embeddedexpert.io/public/storage/upload/books/230201035117-9241Embedded Display Drivers Development A Bare-Metal Approach.jpg

courses.name: Embedded MicroPython from Ground Up™
courses.description: MicroPython is an efficient implementation of Python3 optimized for microcontrollers. Learn to develop various drivers and integrate advanced topics like adding Assembly and C code to MicroPython.

courses.name: Digital Signal Processing (DSP) From Ground Up™ on Arm Processors
courses.description: Learn the foundations of signal processing and develop practical DSP algorithms using ARM processors. Topics include FIR/IIR filters, convolution, DFT/IDFT, and real-time signal processing.
courses.image: https://be.embeddedexpert.io/public/storage/upload/books/230201035308-5740Digital Signal Processing (DSP) From Ground Up™ on Arm Processors.jpg

courses.name: Embedded Google Cloud Python Gateway Communication
courses.description: Embark on a transformative journey with our practical course that integrates embedded systems with Google Cloud Platform (GCP). Gain hands-on experience with Google Cloud, leveraging Python for UART communication, mastering Google Cloud Storage, and diving into Google Firebase NoSQL Database.

courses.name: Firmware Version Control with Git from Ground Up
courses.description: Learn Git-based version control for firmware development, covering Git Bash, eGit in STM32CubeIDE, SourceTree, and GitHub. Master VCS concepts, repository management, and collaboration techniques.

courses.name: Modern Embedded GUI with TouchGFX
courses.description: Learn to create engaging graphical user interfaces (GUIs) for embedded systems using TouchGFX, covering setup, graphics engine, and practical projects.

courses.name: WiFi IoT Architecture: From Firmware to Full Stack Web Development
courses.description: Transform into an IoT professional specializing in WiFi technologies. Learn to develop bare-metal firmware, handle sensor data, and design IoT devices with WiFi and 4G LTE connectivity.

courses.name: Flash Memory and EEPROM Drivers: A Hands-On Guide for Embedded Engineers
courses.description: Master the fundamentals of memory storage and build scalable and efficient memory storage systems for your applications. Learn memory management techniques, advanced driver implementation, and optimization for performance and reliability.

courses.name: USB Host Development Essential Training with CubeMX
courses.description: Learn to develop USB Hosts like HID, CDC, and Mass Storage Hosts using CubeMX. Gain comprehensive USB technology skills for creating robust USB systems.

courses.name: Advanced Digital Signal Processing on ARM Processors
courses.description: This course teaches optimized DSP techniques, tools, and methodologies on ARM Cortex microcontrollers. Topics include FIR & IIR filters, adaptive filters, and advanced RADIX-4 FFT algorithms.

courses.name: USB Device Development Essential Training with CubeMX
courses.description: Learn USB device development with CubeMX, covering USB fundamentals, device classes, and practical implementations. Gain hands-on experience with STM32 USB Device Library and develop various USB devices.

courses.name: Embedded Azure Cloud Python Gateway Communication
courses.description: Learn to leverage Microsoft Azure for IoT solutions, from storage management to real-time data handling with CosmosDB. Gain practical skills in Azure services, Python integration, and IoT data management.

courses.name: Embedded Audio Solutions: Developing an Audio Media Player
courses.description: Welcome to the 'Embedded Audio Media Player' course, your quickest way to developing a complete audio media player. Turn ideas into inventions and future-proof your career with hands-on modules.

courses.name: Advanced Sensing: Time of Flight (ToF) Sensors
courses.description: Learn to harness the VL53L1X sensor for precise, reliable, and versatile applications in various industries. This course covers interfacing, calibration, and real-world projects.
courses.image: https://be.embeddedexpert.io/public/storage/upload/books/241008053135-2605 Advanced Sensing Time of Flight (ToF) Sensors.jpg

courses.name: Mastering FileSystems and SD Card Drivers on Embedded Device
courses.description: Learn to integrate FatFs and SD Card storage on STM32 microcontrollers. Master file system design, implementation, and troubleshooting.
courses.image: https://be.embeddedexpert.io/public/storage/upload/books/241008053345-5285Mastering FileSystems and SD Card Drivers on Embedded Device.jpg

courses.name: Embedded Touchscreen Drivers Development: A Bare-Metal Approach
courses.description: Learn to develop robust bare-metal drivers for embedded touchscreens, focusing on the XPT2046 controller. This course covers calibration, noise reduction, and integration into graphics modules.
courses.image: https://be.embeddedexpert.io/public/storage/upload/books/241008054541-5594Embedded Touchscreen Drivers Development A Bare-Metal Approach.jpg

courses.name: Embedded Systems Cryptography & Encryption
courses.description: Learn encryption and cryptography for embedded systems, focusing on STM32. Master AES, RSA, and elliptic curves with hands-on projects.

courses.name: Embedded Local Database Storage: MySQL
courses.description: Learn to integrate STM32, NodeJS, and MySQL to create an embedded system that sends data via USB and stores it in a MySQL database. Master MySQL Workbench, SQL commands, and database operations.

courses.name: Embedded System IoT Systems Design
courses.description: Learn to build a complete IoT system from scratch, including firmware development, GUI dashboard creation, and cloud integration for data storage and device control.

courses.name: LoRa from Ground Up™
courses.description: This course provides a comprehensive understanding of LoRa technology and its applications in IoT. Learn to develop LoRa drivers, manage data, and implement LoRa-based IoT applications.

courses.name: ZigBee from Ground Up: From Theory and Hands-On Training
courses.description: Explore ZigBee technology and its role in IoT and smart homes. Learn network management, data transfer, and develop ZigBee firmware applications.
courses.image: https://be.embeddedexpert.io/public/storage/upload/books/241009071654-2113ZigBee from Ground Up From Theory and Hands-On Training.jpg

courses.name: Hands-On Embedded C++ Library Development
courses.description: This course elevates your Embedded C++ expertise to an industry-leading standard, focusing on real-world applications and FreeRTOS integration. Learn to develop a Bluetooth Low Energy Library using the HM-10 module.

courses.name: Hands-On Biometric Firmware Mastery with Fingerprint Sensors
courses.description: Learn to develop robust biometric authentication systems using STM32 microcontrollers and fingerprint sensors. Gain hands-on experience with Optical and Capacitive sensors, firmware logic, and data security.
courses.image: https://be.embeddedexpert.io/public/storage/upload/books/241009072114-9260Hands-On Biometric Firmware Mastery with Fingerprint Sensors.jpg

courses.name: Windows x86 Assembly Programming From Ground Up™
courses.description: Learn x86 Processor History, Architecture, and Practical Assembly Programming. Master the x86 Core Instruction Set and develop complex algorithms in x86 assembly.
courses.image: https://be.embeddedexpert.io/public/storage/upload/books/241009072255-2743Windows x86 Assembly Programming From Ground Up™.jpg

courses.name: Matlab Digital Image Processing From Ground Up™
courses.description: This course provides a solid foundation in practical image processing techniques using Matlab, avoiding abstract mathematical theories. By the end, you'll be able to perform noise suppression, edge detection, spatial filtering, histogram equalization, and image enhancement.
courses.image: https://be.embeddedexpert.io/public/storage/upload/books/241009072432-5198Matlab Digital Image Processing From Ground Up™.jpg

courses.name: Python Network Programming From Ground Up ™
courses.description: This course teaches you how to build network applications in Python, covering topics like TCP/IP, HTTP, and developing HTTP clients/servers, FTP servers, and a GUI Email Client. No prior knowledge of Python or network programming is assumed.

courses.name: Python- Build Modern Desktop GUI Applications
courses.description: Learn to develop real-world desktop applications using Python and the Kivy framework. Master layouts, widgets, and build modern GUI applications from scratch.

courses.name: { C Language } Deep Learning From Ground Up™
courses.description: This course provides a solid foundation in modern GUI application development using Python and the Kivy framework. Learn to develop real-world desktop applications while mastering Python and Kivy.

courses.name: Python Real-time Population Health Desktop Application
courses.description: Build a modern GUI application for tracking population health from scratch, using the Covid-19 pandemic as a case study. Master tools for designing GUI layouts, integrating real-time data, and deploying the application.

courses.name: Printed Circuit Board (PCB) Design from the Ground Up ™
courses.description: Learn to design and print your own custom PCBs, incorporating essential components like MCU chips, oscillators, and USB interfaces. This course covers everything from schematic capture to complex PCB layout, enabling you to bring your hardware projects to life.
courses.image: https://be.embeddedexpert.io/public/storage/upload/books/241009073309-3104Printed Circuit Board (PCB) Design from the Ground Up ™.jpg

courses.name: Arduino Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) From Ground Up™
courses.description: This course provides in-depth training to build BLE embedded devices and communicate with smart devices and mobile apps. Learn to develop BLE firmware, understand the BLE stack, and create your own services and characteristics.
courses.image: https://be.embeddedexpert.io/public/storage/upload/books/241009073634-3270Arduino Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) From Ground Up™.jpg

courses.name: High Performance Display Drivers: DMA2D, LTDC, FMC, SDRAM
courses.description: Master high-performance display drivers with a focus on DMA2D, LTDC, FMC, and SDRAM. Gain hands-on experience and practical implementation skills for advanced display systems.
courses.image: https://be.embeddedexpert.io/public/storage/upload/books/241009075019-9624High Performance Display Drivers DMA2D, LTDC, FMC, SDRAM.jpg

courses.name: Embedded Data Visualization and Real-Time Dashboards
courses.description: Learn to create dynamic visual representations of embedded systems data using Node-RED and STM32CubeMonitor. Master advanced monitoring techniques, data logging, and optimization strategies.

courses.name: Mastering the CAN Bus from Ground Up™
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals and advanced applications of CAN Bus technology, essential for modern automotive and industrial systems. Gain hands-on experience with STM32 microcontrollers and real-world scenarios.
courses.image: https://be.embeddedexpert.io/public/storage/upload/books/241009075344-3427Mastering the CAN Bus from Ground Up™.jpg

courses.name: RadarInsight: Hands-On Presence Sensing with Radar
courses.description: Learn radar technology for presence sensing, covering radar signal processing, the LD2410 sensor, and application development. Ideal for engineers and professionals seeking to enhance their skills.

courses.name: Embedded Imaging: Digital Camera Development from Ground Up™
courses.description: Unlock the transformative power of digital imaging technology with our expert-led course on embedded imaging. This course is designed to elevate your career by equipping you with high-demand skills in digital camera firmware development.
courses.image: https://be.embeddedexpert.io/public/storage/upload/books/241009075636-7204Embedded Imaging Digital Camera Development from Ground Up™.jpg

courses.name: Environmental Sensing Drivers: A Bare-Metal Approach
courses.description: Learn to create bare-metal drivers for various environmental sensors, including air quality, temperature, humidity, pressure, soil moisture, and light intensity. This course provides hands-on, practical knowledge to elevate your skills in modern sensing technology.

courses.name: Hands-On GPS Firmware Development
courses.description: Learn to develop bare-metal drivers and libraries for receiving and parsing satellite data to build a complete GPS system. Master GPS trilateration, ephemeris data, and NMEA data structure for robust GPS firmware development.

courses.name: Wearable Innovations: Engineering Smartwatches from Scratch
courses.description: Learn to develop smartwatches from conceptual design to functional prototype, mastering health tracking algorithms and real-time clock components. Gain hands-on experience with hardware and create a fully functional smartwatch.

courses.name: Embedded RFID/NFC Bare-Metal Development
courses.description: Learn to develop RFID/NFC firmware applications from scratch, including interfacing MIFARE MFRC522 NFC chips with STM32 microcontrollers. This course covers both theoretical concepts and practical implementation, including cloud connectivity.

courses.name: {C++} Build Your Own Realtime OS (RTOS) From Ground Up™ on ARM
courses.description: This course teaches you how to build Real-Time Operating Systems through intensive practice and theory. Learn to build your own RTOS from scratch, including various scheduling algorithms and Inter-Thread communication tools.
courses.image: https://be.embeddedexpert.io/public/storage/upload/books/230126100007-3221{C++}Build Your Own Realtime OS (RTOS) From Ground Up™ on ARM.webp

courses.name: Embedded AWS Cloud Python Gateway Communication
courses.description: This course merges embedded systems with Amazon Web Services (AWS), providing hands-on experience and insights into AWS features, services, and best practices for IoT professionals.

courses.name: Embedded System IoT Systems Design
courses.description: Learn to build a complete IoT system from scratch, including firmware development, GUI dashboard creation, and cloud integration for data storage and device control.

courses.name: Embedded Systems Bare-Metal Ethernet Programming
courses.description: Learn to write/configure drivers for the Ethernet peripheral and develop embedded Ethernet firmware for networking protocols like HTTP and DHCP. Master Ethernet driver development, peripheral configuration, and TCP/IP stack integration.

courses.name: Embedded Systems Cellular Firmware Development(GSM)
courses.description: Learn to develop drivers and libraries for adding cellular functionality to your embedded device using the STM32 microcontroller and the A6 GSM/GPRS chip. This course covers phone calls, SMS, M2M communication, and more.

courses.name: Embedded Systems Design Patterns From Ground Up™
courses.description: Learn to apply design patterns to embedded firmware development, providing reusable solutions to common software problems. This course covers various design patterns through practical examples and real-world problem-solving.
courses.image: https://be.embeddedexpert.io/public/storage/upload/books/230126092712-5876Embedded Systems Design Patterns From Ground Up™.webp

courses.name: Embedded Wifi Bare-Metal Development From Ground Up™
courses.description: Learn to develop drivers and libraries for connecting embedded devices to the internet using STM32 and ESP8266. Master WIFI protocol, create efficient data structures, and build applications like web servers and clients.
courses.image: https://be.embeddedexpert.io/public/storage/upload/books/230126094747-9455Embedded Wifi Bare-Metal Development From Ground Up™.webp

courses.name: Embedded RFID/NFC Bare-Metal Development
courses.description: Learn to develop RFID/NFC firmware applications from scratch, including interfacing MIFARE MFRC522 NFC chips with STM32 microcontrollers. This course covers both theoretical concepts and practical implementation, including cloud connectivity.

courses.name: NFC Desktop Application Development
courses.description: Learn Python essentials, GUI development with Kivy, and Firebase integration to build a complete NFC desktop application. This course covers everything from user authentication to cloud database storage.

courses.name: Hands-On GPS Firmware Development
courses.description: Learn to develop bare-metal drivers and libraries for GPS systems, including parsing satellite data for longitude, latitude, and altitude. Master GPS module integration, data structures, and NMEA data parsing.

courses.name: Wireless System Development with nRF24
courses.description: Learn to build a complete wireless system using the nRF24L01 transceiver for data management and control. Develop drivers, modern GUI applications, and end-to-end systems for sensor data collection and storage.

courses.name: Wireless System Development with nRF24
courses.description: Learn to build a complete wireless system for data management and control using the nRF24L01 transceiver. Develop end-to-end systems for sensor data collection and wireless peripherals like game controllers.

courses.name: MQ Telemetry Transport (MQTT) From Ground Up
courses.description: Learn to develop complete IoT solutions using MQTT, a lightweight protocol for machine-to-machine communication. This course covers core MQTT concepts, Python essentials, driver development, and real-world applications.

courses.name: Advanced Embedded Systems Bare-Metal Programming Ground Up™
courses.description: Master advanced bare-metal programming with comprehensive guides on DMA, RTC, Watchdog Timer drivers, and debugging techniques. Enhance your skills in developing robust and efficient embedded solutions.
courses.image: https://be.embeddedexpert.io/public/storage/upload/books/230201033157-2190Advanced Embedded Systems Bare-Metal Programming Ground Up™.jpg

courses.name: Embedded Build Systems with GNU Tools and Makefiles
courses.description: Learn to develop embedded firmware without an IDE using GNU tools and Makefiles. Master the build process, linker scripts, C startup files, and automating builds.
courses.image: https://be.embeddedexpert.io/public/storage/upload/books/230201034250-1348Embedded Build Systems with GNU Tools and Makefiles.jpg

courses.name: 4G LTE IoT: Bare-Metal to HTTP, MQTT, SMS
courses.description: Learn to develop bare-metal firmware for STM32 microcontrollers interfacing with 4G LTE chips, and master HTTP, MQTT, and SMS protocols for IoT applications. This course covers server-side development, sensor data collection, and creating real-world IoT solutions.

courses.name: WiFi IoT Architecture: From Firmware to Full Stack Web Development
courses.description: Transform into an IoT professional specializing in WiFi technologies. Learn to develop bare-metal firmware, handle sensor data, and design IoT devices with WiFi and 4G LTE connectivity.

courses.name: Embedded Memory Security: Protecting Your System from Tampering and Unauthorized Access
courses.description: Learn advanced techniques to secure embedded memory from unauthorized access and tampering, including MPU, Tamper Detection, and Read/Write Protection using Option Bytes. Ideal for professionals aiming to protect their embedded systems against security threats.

courses.name: Custom Cloud <> Python Gateway Communication
courses.description: Learn to integrate embedded systems with Google Cloud Platform (GCP) using Python for effective UART communication and data management. Master Google Cloud Storage operations, Firebase NoSQL Database, and real-world IoT scenarios.

courses.name: Embedded Bootloader Development from Ground Up™
courses.description: Learn to develop custom bootloaders for STM32 microcontrollers, covering the build process, memory model, and linker scripts. Gain hands-on experience in creating multi-slot memory system bootloaders and implementing firmware updates.

courses.name: Master Firmware Updates with In-Application Programming(IAP)
courses.description: Learn to update devices remotely, fix bugs, and add new features with In-Application Programming (IAP). Gain expertise in developing IAP host applications in Python and designing advanced bare-metal bootloaders for STM32 microcontrollers.

courses.name: 4G LTE-Powered FOTA: Firmware Updates over Mobile Networks
courses.description: Learn to implement Firmware Update Over-the-Air (FOTA) using 4G LTE for reliable, remote updates. Master custom bootloader development, 4G LTE connectivity, and STM32 Flash memory management.
courses.image: https://be.embeddedexpert.io/public/storage/upload/books/241008041333-51264G LTE-Powered FOTA Firmware Updates over Mobile Networks.jpg

courses.name: Advanced Firmware Documentation with Doxygen
courses.description: Learn professional firmware documentation with Doxygen, covering syntax, commenting, and advanced techniques. Gain practical experience and enhance your documentation skills for embedded C and C++ projects.

courses.name: Mastering SD Card Bootloader Development
courses.description: Learn to update firmware using SD cards for remote, industrial, and automotive applications. Gain hands-on experience in implementing secure and efficient SD card-based firmware updates.

courses.name: Advanced Audio Processing: Mastering I2S, Codecs, Audio Input, and Output
courses.description: Master STM32-based audio systems, from I2S protocols to advanced audio codec integration. Gain hands-on skills in audio input, output, and processing.
courses.image: https://be.embeddedexpert.io/public/storage/upload/books/241008042359-2423Advanced Audio Processing Mastering I2S, Codecs, Audio Input, and Output.jpg

courses.name: Embedded Audio Storage and Analysis: I2S, DMA, FFT, Spectrum Analysis, SD Card, FatFS, Recorder, Playback.
courses.description: Learn real-time audio capture, storage, analysis, and playback on STM32 systems using I2S, DMA, FFT, and SD cards. Develop skills for building spectrum analyzers, voice recorders, and advanced audio processing applications.
courses.image: https://be.embeddedexpert.io/public/storage/upload/books/241008042628-2653Embedded Audio Storage and Analysis I2S, DMA, FFT, Spectrum Analysis, SD Card, FatFS, Recorder, Playback..jpg

courses.name: Wireless Firmware Update: Mastering FOTA with STM32 and ESP8266
courses.description: Learn to implement Firmware Update Over-the-Air (FOTA) for embedded systems using STM32 and ESP8266. Master custom bootloader development, Wi-Fi connection libraries, and remote server setup for handling firmware updates.
courses.image: https://be.embeddedexpert.io/public/storage/upload/books/241008042840-8253Wireless Firmware Update Mastering FOTA with STM32 and ESP8266.jpg

courses.name: Extreme Embedded Firmware Engineering Learning Path
courses.description: This learning path includes 3 comprehensive courses totaling 44+ hours, complete with source code. You'll learn to develop firmware without an IDE, master C++ for embedded systems, and apply design patterns to solve real-world problems.

courses.name: Embedded Systems Data Structures & State Machines
courses.description: Enhance your embedded firmware development skills by mastering state machines and data structures. Learn to build Finite State Machines, Fixed Schedulers, and Traffic Light Control Systems.

courses.name: Multicore Firmware Development from Ground Up™
courses.description: Learn multicore firmware development for advanced projects like autonomous drones. Master STM32H7 Dual-Core environment, inter-processor communication, debugging, and profiling.

courses.name: Mastering ARM TrustZone: Secure Embedded Systems with Cortex-M23/M33
courses.description: Learn to secure embedded systems using ARM TrustZone technology on Cortex-M23/M33 processors. Gain hands-on experience with TrustZone features, secure/non-secure states, and real-time operating systems.
courses.image: https://be.embeddedexpert.io/public/storage/upload/books/241008052138-4143Mastering ARM TrustZone Secure Embedded Systems with Cortex-M23-M33.jpg

courses.name: Build Your Own RealTime OS (RTOS 1) From Ground Up™ on ARM 1
courses.description: This course teaches you how to build a Real-Time Operating System (RTOS) through intensive practice and theory. By the end, you will be able to build your own RTOS from scratch, implement various schedulers, and understand the internals of an RTOS kernel.
courses.image: https://be.embeddedexpert.io/public/storage/upload/books/230131075212-6213Build Your Own RealTime OS (RTOS 1) From Ground Up™ on ARM 1.webp

courses.name: {C++} Build Your Own RealTime OS (RTOS) From Ground Up™ on ARM
courses.description: Learn to build Real-Time Operating Systems from scratch in C++, covering scheduling algorithms and inter-thread communication tools. Master RTOS concepts and develop your own OS kernel.
courses.image: https://be.embeddedexpert.io/public/storage/upload/books/230126095907-6957{C++}Build Your Own Realtime OS (RTOS) From Ground Up™ on ARM3.webp

courses.name: Build Your Own RealTime OS (RTOS 2) From Ground Up™ on ARM 2
courses.description: This course offers an in-depth exploration of Real-Time Operating Systems (RTOS) through intensive practice and comprehensive theory. By the end, you will be equipped to build your own Real-Time Operating System from scratch and implement various schedulers.
courses.image: https://be.embeddedexpert.io/public/storage/upload/books/230131074720-8400Build Your Own RealTime OS (RTOS 2) From Ground Up™ on ARM 2.webp

courses.name: Realtime Operating Systems (RTOS) Learning Path
courses.description: 4 Courses | 47+ hours | Complete Source Included. Learn FreeRTOS, ARM Assembly Programming, and build your own RTOS from scratch with comprehensive tutorials and hands-on projects.

courses.name: FreeRTOS From Ground Up™ on ARM Processors
courses.description: Learn the foundations of real-time systems and build real-time applications using FreeRTOS. Master multitask FreeRTOS applications, scheduling algorithms, and porting FreeRTOS to ARM processors.
courses.image: https://be.embeddedexpert.io/public/storage/upload/books/230131074408-4623FreeRTOS From Ground Up™ on ARM Processors.webp

courses.name: MQ Telemetry Transport (MQTT) From Ground Up
courses.description: Learn to develop complete IoT solutions using MQTT, a lightweight protocol for machine-to-machine communication. This course covers core MQTT concepts, Python essentials, driver development, and real-world applications.

courses.name: Embedded Google Cloud <> Python Gateway Communication
courses.description: Learn to integrate embedded systems with Google Cloud Platform (GCP) using Python for effective UART communication and data management. Master Google Cloud Storage operations, Firebase NoSQL Database, and real-world IoT scenarios.

courses.name: WiFi IoT Architecture: From Firmware to Full Stack Web Development
courses.description: Transform into a pioneering IoT professional with a specialization in WiFi technologies. Learn to design and deploy custom server-side applications, master sensor data collection and transmission using HTTP, and develop firmware for IoT devices.

courses.name: 4G LTE IoT: Bare-Metal to HTTP, MQTT, SMS
courses.description: Learn to develop bare-metal firmware for STM32 microcontrollers interfacing with 4G LTE chips, and master HTTP, MQTT, and SMS protocols for IoT applications. This course covers server-side development, sensor data collection, and creating real-world IoT solutions.

courses.name: Custom Cloud <> Python Gateway Communication
courses.description: Learn to integrate embedded systems with Google Cloud Platform (GCP) using Python for effective UART communication and data management. Master Google Cloud Storage operations, Firebase NoSQL Database, and real-world IoT scenarios.

courses.name: Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) From Ground Up™
courses.description: Learn to build BLE embedded devices and communicate with smart devices and mobile apps. Master the BLE protocol, stack, and create your own services and characteristics.

courses.name: Embedded Systems Cellular Firmware Development(GSM)
courses.description: Learn to develop drivers and libraries for adding cellular functionality to your embedded device using the STM32 microcontroller and the A6 GSM/GPRS chip. Master phone calls, SMS, M2M communication, and more.

courses.name: Embedded Wifi Bare-Metal Development From Ground Up™
courses.description: Learn to develop drivers and libraries for connecting embedded devices to the internet using STM32 and ESP8266. Master networking concepts, WIFI protocol, and build applications like WebServer and Web Client.

courses.name: Embedded RFID/NFC Bare-Metal Development
courses.description: Learn to develop RFID/NFC firmware applications from scratch, including interfacing MIFARE MFRC522 NFC chips with STM32 microcontrollers and creating a modern desktop application with cloud connectivity.

courses.name: Embedded IR Remote Control with NEC Protocol
courses.description: Learn to develop bare-metal drivers and libraries to control your embedded device using IR remote controls. Master IR modulation, NEC protocol, and real-world applications.
courses.image: https://be.embeddedexpert.io/public/storage/upload/books/230201031722-7980Embedded IR Remote Control with NEC Protocol.jpg

courses.name: Hands-On GPS Firmware Development
courses.description: Learn to develop bare-metal drivers and libraries for GPS systems, including parsing satellite data for longitude, latitude, and altitude. Master GPS module integration, data structures, and NMEA data parsing.

courses.name: Wireless System Development with nRF24
courses.description: Learn to build a complete wireless system for data management and control using the nRF24L01 transceiver. Develop end-to-end systems for sensor data collection and wireless peripherals like game controllers.

courses.name: Embedded RFID/NFC Bare-Metal Development
courses.description: Learn to develop RFID/NFC firmware applications from scratch, including interfacing MIFARE MFRC522 NFC chips with STM32 microcontrollers. This course covers both theoretical concepts and practical implementation, including cloud connectivity.

courses.name: WiFi IoT Architecture: From Firmware to Full Stack Web Development
courses.description: Learn to design and deploy custom server-side applications, master sensor data collection and transmission using HTTP, and develop firmware for IoT devices. This course covers WiFi in IoT, ESP8266, bare-metal driver development, and server-side development.

courses.name: 4G LTE IoT: Bare-Metal to HTTP, MQTT, SMS
courses.description: Learn to develop bare-metal firmware for STM32 microcontrollers interfacing with 4G LTE chips, and master HTTP, MQTT, and SMS protocols for IoT applications. This course covers server-side development, sensor data collection, and creating real-world IoT solutions.

courses.name: Embedded Azure Cloud <> Python Gateway Communication
courses.description: Learn to leverage Microsoft Azure for IoT solutions, from storage management to real-time data handling with CosmosDB. Gain practical skills in Azure services, Python integration, and IoT data management.

courses.name: ARM Assembly Language From Ground Up™ 1
courses.description: Learn ARM Systems Design, Architecture, and Practical Assembly Programming. Master ARM Instruction Sets, create data structures, and design complex algorithms in assembly.

courses.name: ARM Assembly Language From Ground Up™ 2
courses.description: Learn to build peripheral drivers and firmware using ARM Assembly Language. Master ADC, UART, PWM, GPIO, and TIMER configurations.

courses.name: ARM Assembly Programming Mastery Pack
courses.description: Covering ARM Systems Design, Architecture, and Practical Assembly Programming. Master ARM Instruction Sets, create data structures, and write drivers for microcontroller peripherals.

courses.name: ARM GNU Assembly Programming From Ground Up™
courses.description: Learn ARM Systems Design, Architecture, and Practical Assembly Programming using GNU assembler. Master ARM Instruction Sets and build peripheral drivers and firmware in assembly.
courses.image: https://be.embeddedexpert.io/public/storage/upload/books/230131081956-1562ARM GNU Assembly Programming From Ground Up™.webp
